name.br: Vaso de Flores Maduras do Amor
name.vi: Lọ hoa tình yêu trưởng thành

description.en: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 10% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes an Ancient Flowerpot of Love.
description.ar: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 10% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes an Ancient Flowerpot of Love.
description.br: Aumenta a vida máxima (HP) em 300 e o Ataque em 10% por 1 hora. Uma vez expirado, se torna um Vaso de Flores Anciãs do Amor.
description.cns: 最大生命值+300，攻击力+10%，持续1小时。 过期后，它就会变成一个古老的爱的花钵。
description.de: Erhöht deine HP um +300 und deine Angriffskraft um 10% für eine Stunde. Sobald es abgelaufen ist, verwandelt es sich in einen Ancient Flowerpot of Love.
description.fi: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 10% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes an Ancient Flowerpot of Love.
description.fil: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 10% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes an Ancient Flowerpot of Love.
description.fr: PV max +300, attaque +10% (1h). Se transforme ensuite en Pot d'âme.
description.id: Meningkatkan Max HP sebesar +300 dan Attack Power sebesar 10% selama 1 jam. Setelah kedaluwarsa, itu menjadi Ancient Flowerpot of Love.
description.it: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 10% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes an Ancient Flowerpot of Love.
description.jp: 1時間、最大HPが+300、追加攻撃力+10%増加します。使用後は感謝の植木鉢になります。
description.kr: 1시간 동안 최대 체력이 +300, 공격력이 10% 증가합니다. 유통기한이 끝나면 감사의 화분이 됩니다.
description.nl: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 10% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes an Ancient Flowerpot of Love.
description.pl: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 10% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes an Ancient Flowerpot of Love.
description.ru: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 10% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes an Ancient Flowerpot of Love.
description.sp: Aumenta la Máx. HP en +300 y el Poder de Ataque en un 10% durante 1 hora. Cuando expira, se convierte en una Maceta de Amor Antigua.
description.sw: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 10% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes an Ancient Flowerpot of Love.
description.th: เพิ่ม Max HP +300 และ Attack Power 10% เป็นเวลา 1 ชั่วโมง หลังจากหมดอายุจะกลายเป็นAncient Flowerpot of Love
description.tw: 最大上限HP+300和攻擊力+10%，持續1小時，時間一到將會變成古老的愛情盆栽
description.vi: Tăng Máu tối đa thêm 300 và Sức tấn công thêm 10% trong 1 giờ. Sau khi hết hạn, nó sẽ trở thành một Flowerpot of Love.
